name: Dungeon of Infinite Slimes
description:
Controls - Mouse&Keyboard / GamePad

Move - W and D / Left Stick

Jump - Space / Left Trigger, South Button

Aim - Mouse / Right Stick

Fire - Left Click / Right Trigger

Create New Spell Orb - 2 / D-Pad Down

Upgrade Currently Selected Orb - 1 / D-Pad Up

Switch Between Orbs - R / D-Pad Left and Right (Orbs will all rotate so that the selected is in line with the targeting diamond.)

Change Offset of Current Orb from targeting diamond/other orbs - Q and E / Left and Right Shoulder Buttons
